ing: 1 tablespoon whole cloves, or to taste
des: "Great for a night by the fireplace or a holiday party! For a stronger drink use 100-proof liquor. Serve with a cinnamon stick in the glass."
ins: Heat apple cider in a large pot over medium heat; add cinnamon sticks, orange peel, raisins, and cloves. Simmer apple cider mixture until flavors have blended, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and stir rum into apple cider mixture; strain into a punch bowl or container. Serve hot.
